result.name: technology-programme-records
result.notes: Research Records related to the technology programme at CCFE, researching new advanced technologies and materials for example.

organization.name: united-kingdom-atomic-energy-authority
organization.title: United Kingdom Atomic Energy Authority
organization.description: The UK Atomic Energy Authority carries out fusion research in the UK on behalf of the government and manages the JET fusion project on behalf of the EU at the Culham Centre for Fusion Energy (CCFE).

result.title: Technology Programme Records

extras.value: N/A.  Research papers and presentations publish the results of this work. There is no plan to release the underlying records, but all papers carry an acknowledgement and a note on who to contact to obtain further information on the data and models underlying the paper.
